name: MarbleVerse
summary: Dive into MarbleVerse! An exciting, nostalgic marble racing game where players can have fun while participating in exhilarating races. Empowered by cutting edge blockchain technology, players in MarbleVerse can race their Marbles against one-another and earn rewards for their victories. Design your tracks! Win Races! Upgrade your Marbles to participate in more races and become the leader of the MarbleVerse!
